lines.text: Thanks for the compliment. Don't expect one in return!

[hanging by the skirt of her dress]
I happen to like climbing in trees!
Hush! Judge, we don't speak of her here.
My dear child, is she living?
Oh, if I could only be somewhere other than where I am, someone other than who I am!
There now, where and what do you want to be?
They say five have left already.
There must be something terribly frightening in this house!
That sounds like a perfect description of me!
The heart is a house with a room for every person it loves.
Alcohol in the middle of the day is exciting when one is 30, but disastrous when one is 70.
